reviewText: This tape contains 4 classic episodes of sf television:  Frankenstein, starring Lon Chaney, Jr. as the monster; Dune Roller starring Bruce Cabot (King Kong); Appointment on Mars starring Leslie Nielsen (Forbidden Planet, The Naked Gun) and Brian Keith (Family Affair, etc.); and Crystal Egg starring Thomas Mitchell (Gone With The Wind), based on a story by H.G. Wells (The War of the Worlds).  Still entertaining for low-budget live b&w TV.
